localizedMeta.description:
FarmFury! brings next-gen farming experience where you physically destroy your opponents farm in order to become the best in the industry!

The game is a simplified RTS game where you produce mice and cow to attack and protect defend farms and use upgrades and special skills as a tactical options.

Expected Play time:
- 30 seconds ～ 5min per match.

Package size: 32 MB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1 Player

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Touchscreen
- Controller / On-screen controller

Supported languages:
English(United States)/English(United Kingdom)/Japanese

Copyright (C) 2013 MAX NEET GAME'S. All Rights Reserved.

The game is a simplified RTS game where you produce mice and cow to attack and protect defend farms and use upgrades and special skills as a tactical options.

The game is a simplified RTS game where you produce mice and cow to attack and protect defend farms and use upgrades and special skills as a tactical options.

Expected Play time:
- 30 seconds ～ 5min per match.

Package size: 32 MB - More storage space required for install

- Touchscreen

FarmFury! brings next-gen farming experience where you physically destroy your opponents farm in order to become the best in the industry!

The game is a simplified RTS game where you produce mice and cow to attack and protect defend farms and use upgrades and special skills as a tactical options.

Expected Play time:
- 30 seconds ～ 5min per match.

Package size: 32 MB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1 Player

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Touchscreen
- Controller / On-screen controller

Supported languages:
English(United States)/English(United Kingdom)/Japanese

Copyright (C) 2013 MAX NEET GAME'S. All Rights Reserved.

FarmFury!は自分の牧場を業界トップにする為に動物を使って競争相手の牧場を物理的に潰すゲームです

ゲーム内容は簡易RTSで、画面を固定 + 簡単な操作によりサクッと遊べるようになっており、「対戦型タワーディフェンス」とも言えるゲームです。

想定プレイ時間:
- １試合 30秒 ～ 5分

コンテンツ容量: 32 MB

プレイ人数: 1人

対応機能:
- タッチスクリーン
- コントローラーまたは、オンスクリーンコントローラー

対応言語:
英語(アメリカ)/英語(イギリス)/日本語

著作権等:
Copyright (C) 2013 MAX NEET GAME'S. All Rights Reserved.
